title: Can't run "List Resources" a second time
body:
I'm just getting started on building a custom server, so forgive me if I'm misunderstanding something.

I'm using the default example server that is created when running `npx @modelcontextprotocol/create-server`.

It seems that you can list the Notes by running "List Resources" and you can create a Note from the Tools tab.
But it doesn't seem to be possible to list the new notes after creating one.

Reproduction:
- create a new server
- build
- run the inspector
- connect
- click the List Resources button
- create a new note from the Tools tab
- Try to list the resources again (not possible)
author: perfectbase

comments.body: Fair callout! I think adding a Reset or Clear button to the top of the List Resources section could be useful here.
